00024         void TPathCommandParser::parse(Path *path, char command,
00025                 PathDataParser *dataParser, const vector<float> &arguments)
00026                 const
00027         {
00028             QPathCommandParser *qCommandParser = new QPathCommandParser();
00029 
00030             for(vector<float>::size_type i = 0; i < arguments.size(); i += 2) {
00031 
00032                 Vector2D control = dataParser->getCurrentPoint().reflect(
00033                         dataParser->getLastControlPoint());
00034 
00035                 if(dataParser->isRelativeCommand(command))
00036                     control -= dataParser->getCurrentPoint();
00037 
00038                 vector<float> qArguments;
00039 
00040                 qArguments.push_back(control.getX());
00041                 qArguments.push_back(control.getY());
00042                 for(int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
00043                     qArguments.push_back(arguments[i + j]);
00044 
00045                 char qCommand = dataParser->isRelativeCommand(command) ?
00046                         'q' : 'Q';
00047 
00048                 qCommandParser->parse(path, qCommand, dataParser, qArguments);
00049             }
00050 
00051             delete qCommandParser;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 }
